abstract: The Pulse News Reader, created by a pair of Stanford students, is the top paid app for the iPad.
snippet: The Pulse News Reader, created by a pair of Stanford students, is the top paid app for the iPad.
lead_paragraph: June 8 | Updated  Apple removed the Pulse News Reader from the App Store after the New York Times Company objected to it. It was later reinstated. See our post on the matter.

headline.main: The iPad Pulse Reader Scales the Charts
